alert.note: Alert for Lamar; Marion (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued November 29 at 7:03PM CST until November 30 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Blount, Calhoun, Cherokee, Cleburne, Etowah, Fayette, Jefferson, Lamar, Marion, St. Clair, Walker and Winston. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. Area creeks and streams are running high and could flood with more heavy rain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rainfall of 2 to 4 inches - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
